title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Budget & Spending	

Issued on:
October 1, 2020
On Thursday, October 1, 2020, the President signed into law:S. 2193, the “Charging Helps Agencies Realize General Efficiencies Act” or the “CHARGE Act,” which requires the General Services Administration to issue guidance to clarify that Federal agencies may pay by charge card for the charging of Federal electric motor vehicles; andS. 3105, which designates a facility of the United States Postal Service located at 456 North Meridian Street in Indianapolis, Indiana, as the Richard G. Lugar Post Office.
